text: Dakara anata gata ryonin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga i. â€œHontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuho shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu
